training_plan.title: Quality Assurance Intern Internship Training Plan
training_plan.description: A comprehensive training plan for a 500-hour internship in Quality Assurance, designed to equip interns with the necessary skills and knowledge to excel as a Quality Assurance Intern.

tasks.title: Task 1: Quality Control
tasks.description: Conduct regular quality control checks on products to ensure they meet the required standards.

techStacks.name: Quality Management Software
techStacks.description: Utilize quality management software to track and manage quality control processes.

skills.name: Attention to Detail
skills.description: Ensure thoroughness in quality control checks.

tasks.title: Task 2: Test Case Creation
tasks.description: Create test cases for new features to ensure they meet the required specifications.

techStacks.name: Test Management Tool
techStacks.description: Use a test management tool to organize and track test cases.

skills.name: Analytical Skills
skills.description: Analyze requirements to create effective test cases.

tasks.title: Task 3: Defect Reporting
tasks.description: Identify and report defects found during testing to the development team.

techStacks.name: Defect Tracking System
techStacks.description: Utilize a defect tracking system to log and manage defects.

skills.name: Communication Skills
skills.description: Effectively communicate defect details to the development team.

tasks.title: Task 4: Test Case Creation
tasks.description: Create test cases for a new feature in the application.

techStacks.name: JIRA
techStacks.description: Used for tracking and managing test cases.

skills.name: Test Case Writing
skills.description: Ability to write clear and concise test cases.

skills.name: API Testing
skills.description: Knowledge of testing API endpoints.

tasks.title: Task 5: Automation Scripting
tasks.description: Automate a series of manual tests using Selenium.

techStacks.name: Selenium
techStacks.description: Used for automating web browser interactions.

skills.name: Automation
skills.description: Ability to automate manual tests.

skills.name: Programming
skills.description: Knowledge of programming concepts.

tasks.title: Task 6: Defect Reporting
tasks.description: Identify and report defects found during testing.

skills.name: Defect Identification
skills.description: Ability to identify defects in the application.

skills.name: Reporting
skills.description: Knowledge of how to report defects effectively.

tasks.title: Task 7: Test Case Creation
tasks.description: Create test cases for a new feature in the software application.

techStacks.name: JIRA
techStacks.description: Used for tracking and managing project tasks.

techStacks.name: TestRail
techStacks.description: Used for creating and managing test cases.

skills.name: Test Case Writing
skills.description: Ability to write clear and concise test cases.

skills.name: Software Testing
skills.description: Knowledge of software testing principles and methodologies.

tasks.title: Task 8: Automation Scripting
tasks.description: Automate a set of tests using Selenium WebDriver.

techStacks.name: Selenium WebDriver
techStacks.description: Used for automating web browser interactions.

skills.name: Automation Scripting
skills.description: Ability to write automation scripts using Selenium WebDriver.

skills.name: Java Programming
skills.description: Knowledge of Java programming language.
